ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And I am commanded to be the first of the Muslims.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And I am commanded to be the first of those who submit."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and I am bidden to be the first of those who surrender to Him.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and I am commanded to be the first Muslim".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And I am commanded that I be the first to submit.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And I am commanded (this) in order that I may be the first of the Muslims."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And I am commanded that I shall be the first of those who submit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and I have been commanded to be the first of those that surrender.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And I am commanded to be the first of those who are muslims (surrender unto Him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: I have been commanded to be the first to submit."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And I am commanded this, in order I may be the first Of those who submit.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and I have been commanded to be the foremost of those who submit [to Him].’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And I am commanded to be the first of those who bow to Allah in Islam."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And I am commanded (this) in order that I may be the first of those who submit themselves to Allah (in Islam) as Muslims."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I am ordered to be the first of those to be submissive (Muslims to Him)'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And I was commanded to be the first of those who submit.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And I have been commanded to be the first [among you] of the Muslims."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [39:12] and I have been commanded to be the first of those who submit’, from this community.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And I am commanded) in the Qur'an (to be the first of those who surrender (unto Him)) the first of those who accept Islam.
